LangVersion.description: The version of the C# language the compiler should accept

values.default: The compiler accepts syntax from the latest major version it supports
values.preview: The compiler accepts syntax from the latest preview version it supports
values.latest: The compiler accepts syntax from the latest minor version it supports
values.latestMajor: The compiler accepts syntax from the latest major version it supports
values.ISO-1: The compiler accepts syntax from C# 1.0/1.1 and below, as specified in ISO/IEC 23270:2003
values.ISO-2: The compiler accepts syntax from C# 2.0 and below, as specified in ISO/IEC 23270:2006
values.3: The compiler accepts syntax from C# 3.0 and below
values.4: The compiler accepts syntax from C# 4.0 and below
values.5: The compiler accepts syntax from C# 5.0 and below
values.6: The compiler accepts syntax from C# 6.0 and below
values.7: The compiler accepts syntax from C# 7.0 and below
values.7.1: The compiler accepts syntax from C# 7.1 and below
values.7.2: The compiler accepts syntax from C# 7.2 and below
values.7.3: The compiler accepts syntax from C# 7.3 and below
values.8.0: The compiler accepts syntax from C# 8.0 and below

Deterministic.description: Enables reproducible builds, such that a given set of inputs will always produce byte-for-byte identical output
